name: Crawlspace 2
description:
does not support WMR(reverb g2), HTC VIVE headsets.

you saw an ad about someone needing help fixing their ventilation system. it sounded easy, but this job was much different then the usual work that you were used to. your job will be to fix fans that have lost power by crawling into the ventilation system and restarting fans using your battery. be careful not to run out of power while trapped in the vents.

----

Main Objective:
Stay alive through the nights and complete your week of work.

-7 increasingly difficult nights
-Complete randomized puzzles
-Relax at your home and enjoy some TV
